trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ada
There were no other sightings in Ada on or around December 1st 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving W on 10th Street in Ada, OK when we first sighted the object(s). It was large enough to notice in the sky behind a group of trees. I said, Mil,do you see that!?! she said yes and we turned N onto Hope Street to follow it(itwas first sighted in the NW corner of the sky). We proceeded to follow it forthe next five blocks on Hope. During that time I rolled down my drivers sidewindow to better view it off to my left. In the time we followed it down Hopeit progresses from my left side to the middle of my front windshield (N)andcontinued to travel what looked like NE, decending slightly as it went. Myfirst reaction was that it was one big object and the three smaller objects werejust points on a large triangular craft
Summary: Saw three separate object flying in a triangle pat
